quote: School prepares you for the real world... which also bites.
author: Jim Benton

quote: School is the advertising agency which makes you believe that you need the society as it is.
author: Ivan Illich

quote: I go to school, but I never learn what I want to know.
author: Bill Watterson,  The Authoritative Calvin And Hobbes

quote: What is the most important thing one learns in school? Self-esteem, support, and friendship.
author: Terry Tempest Williams,  Pieces of White Shell

quote: School was the unhappiest time of my life and the worst trick it ever played on me was to pretend that it was the world in miniature. For it hindered me from discovering how lovely and delightful and kind the world can be, and how much of it is intelligible.
author: E.M. Forster

quote: You don't appreciate a lot of stuff in school until you get older. Little things like being spanked every day by a middle-aged woman: Stuff you pay good money for in later life.
author: Emo Philips

quote: I wish my school days could have dragged on a little longer, or that I could go back and do it later in life.
author: Cara Delevingne

quote: Prison for the crime of puberty -- that was how secondary school had seemed.
author: David Brin,  Earth

quote: Education: learning to find your purpose. Upon finding your purpose: what did I learn?
author: Bauvard,  Some Inspiration for the Overenthusiastic

quote: Often, a school is your best bet-perhaps not for education but certainly for protection from an undead attack.
author: Max Brooks,  The Zombie Survival Guide

quote: Schools are a fountain of knowledge: some students come to drink , some to sip and others just to gargle.
author: Shiv Khera,  You Can Win: A Step by Step Tool for Top Achievers

quote: To me education is a leading out of what is already there in the pupil's soul.
author: Muriel Spark,  The Prime of Miss Jean Brodie

quote: In some parts of the world, students are going to school every day. It's their normal life. But in other part of the world, we are starving for education... it's like a precious gift. It's like a diamond.
author: Malala Yousafzai

quote: In school, you're taught a lesson and then given a test. In life, you're given a test that teaches you a lesson.
author: Tom Bodett

quote: Pranks vs school= pranks win all day
author: Justin Bieber,  First Step 2 Forever

quote: Love is the best school, but the tuition is high and the homework can be painful.
author: Diane Ackerman

quote: Education is the movement from darkness to light.
author: Allan Bloom

quote: I am not young enough to know everything.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Education helps you to be what you really want to be.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: You can drag my body to school but my spirit refuses to go.
author: Bill Watterson,  The Essential Calvin and Hobbes

quote: We get schooled by the people around us, and it stays inside us deep.
author: George Pelecanos,  Soul Circus

quote: I'm not young enough to know everything.
author: J.M. Barrie,  The Admirable Crichton

quote: Education is the power to think clearly, the power to act well in the world's work, and the power to appreciate life.
author: Brigham Young

quote: Try not to have a good time...this is supposed to be educational.
author: Charles M. Schulz

quote: The difference between school and life? In school, you're taught a lesson and then given a test. In life, you're given a test that teaches you a lesson.
author: Tom Bodett

quote: LearningTo believe you are magnificent. And gradually to discover that you are not magnificent. Enough labor for one human life.
author: Czesław Miłosz

quote: School has become the world religion of a modernized proletariat, and makes futile promises of salvation to the poor of the technological age.
author: Ivan Illich,  Deschooling Society

quote: It's not that I feel that school is a good idea gone wrong, but a wrong idea from the word go. It's a nutty notion that we can have a place where nothing but learning happens, cut off from the rest of life.
author: John Holt

quote: Education, n. That which discloses to the wise and disguises from the foolish their lack of understanding.
author: Ambrose Bierce,  The Devil's Dictionary

quote: Studying is something I really love doing, and I just hope to have enough money for tuition.
author: Alexandra Kosteniuk

quote: Education enlightens you to see the beauty of life.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Life is still better than University. In school, your teacher is the fruit picker and you are the open fruit basket. Then you take those fruits and make cakes and pies. But life is going to give you the chance to go out there and pick those fruits yourself. Then you can eat them, or make them into something else; any which way, your own hands picked them!
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: Education: that which reveals to the wise, and conceals from the stupid, the vast limits of their knowledge.
author: Mark Twain

quote: I never understand when people say, 'School days are the best of your life.' So it's all downhill from 16? How depressing.
author: Marsha Thomason

quote: Segregation shaped me; education liberated me.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: The more expensive a school is, the more crooks it has — I'm not kidding.
author: J.D. Salinger,  The Catcher in the Rye

quote: She got on with her education. In her opinion, school kept on trying to interfere with it.
author: Terry Pratchett,  Soul Music

quote: Education exposes young people to a broader world, a world full of opportunity and hope.
author: Christine Gregoire

quote: The home environment can undo a lot you try to do at school.
author: Ray Bradbury,  Fahrenheit 451

quote: You go to school everyday. Folks who think they've learned everything they need to know are usually dumber than chickens.
author: Jodi Thomas

quote: Generally in life, knowledge is acquired to be used. But school learning more often fits Freire's apt metaphor: knowledge is treated like money, to be put away in a bank for the future.
author: Seymour Papert,  The Children's Machine: Rethinking School In The Age Of The Computer

quote: Schools and schoolmasters, as we have them today, are not popular as places of education and teachers, but rather prisons and turnkeys in which children are kept to prevent them disturbing and chaperoning their parent.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Education is teaching our children to desire the right things.
author: Plato

quote: Stuff your brain with knowledge.
author: Karl Lagerfeld

quote: If you want to get educated, fall in love with learning.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: What does education often do? It makes a straight-cut ditch of a free, meandering brook.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Education: the path from cocky ignorance to miserable uncertainty.
author: Mark Twain

quote: I'm the girl nobody knows until she commits suicide. Then suddenly everyone had a class with her.
author: Tom Leveen,  Party

quote: Education is the preparation of a child intellectually, emotionally, spiritually, and physically for life and for eternity.
author: Kevin Swanson,  Upgrade: 10 Secrets to the Best Education for Your Child

quote: I want to open up a School of Cannibalism. It’ll be a feeder school for top law schools.
author: Jarod Kintz,  99 Cents For Some Nonsense
